title: Who Was Shear-jashub?
html:
He was one of the sons of the prophet Isaiah who accompanied his father in visiting the king. His name was a prophetic one that meant “the remnant shall return” (Isaiah 7:3 a ; see also Notes and Commentary on Isaiah 8:18).

LDS Church Educational System Old Testament Student Manual, 1 Kings–Malachi, Religion 302, Chapter 13, Item 40
